name: Pirabbits
description:
Just like in the old days! Get a friend, gather around one keyboard - and go get the treasure!
A local multiplayer action game (PVP), that includes rabbits and pirates on an isolated island across the ocean.

The Goal: Be the first to reach the prestigious treasure chest at the top of the island and WIN IT ALL!

Be careful! Each player has a rocket to shoot the other player with, don't hesitate to use it to win the treasure!
